items.title: Trump Upholds Biden's Merger Guidelines: Here's What It Means for Goldman Sachs and Other Investment Banks
items.author: The Motley Fool
items.description: The Trump administration will continue to enforce strict guidelines for mergers and acquisitions (M&A) established during the Biden presidency, maintaining a rigorous approach. This is a setback for investment banks like Goldman Sachs, which had hoped for a more relaxed regulatory environment to increase M&A activities and advisory revenue.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article suggests that the Trump administration's continuation of the Biden-era strict merger guidelines is a setback for investment banks like Goldman Sachs, which had hoped for a more relaxed regulatory environment to boost M&A activities and advisory revenue.
